script:
;;-----------------------------------------
;;3/29新章と覚醒マイペ
# script "lisp"
# bgmfile "bgm263" "BgmLostRagnarok001" 0
# background "underground_world"
;;-----------------------------------------
;;アルマス
# body 172
# pos 172 2
# scale 172 0.8 0
# alpha 172 0 0
;;ティターニア
# body 139
# pos 139 4
# scale 139 0.8 0
# alpha 139 0 0
;;フェイルノート
# body 3401911
# pos 3401911 5
# scale 3401911 0.8 0
# alpha 3401911 0 0
# layer 3401911 3
;;ティファレト
# body 3503211
# pos 3503211 3
# scale 3503211 0.8 0
# alpha 3503211 0 0
# layer 3503211 5
;;カシウス
# body 3303111
# pos 3303111 1
# scale 3303111 0.8 0
# alpha 3303111 0 0
# layer 3303111 1
;;ペルーン
# body 200851
# pos 200851 3
# scale 200851 0.8 0
# alpha 200851 0 0
# mask 200851 off
# body 200854
# pos 200854 5
# scale 200854 0.8 0
# alpha 200854 0 0
# mask 200854 off
;;アダマス
# body 101221
# pos 101221 3
# scale 101221 0.8 0
# alpha 101221 0 0
# mask 101221 off
# body 101225
# pos 101225 1
# scale 101225 0.8 0
# alpha 101225 0 0
# mask 101225 off
;;ヴァジュラ
# body 500535
# pos 500535 3
# scale 500535 0.8 0
# alpha 500535 0 0
# mask 500535 off
;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# imageset 4 "black"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 1
# imagescale 4 1.2 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# envbody 11111 8 0
# effectpattern 11111 1 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# fadein "black" 2
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 2.5

# fadein "white" 0.5
# imagealpha 1 1 1
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 1
# imagepos 2 0 0
# voice 4019 "failnaught_a_title_0001"
# voice 5032 "tiphereth_t_title_0001"
# voice 3031 "cassius_ge_title_0001"
# voice 1038 "almace_title_0001"
# voice 9967 "titania_title_0001"
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 32
@
失われた千年王国編
(ロストラグナロク)

# se "SE_9171"
# fadein "white" 2
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# face 172 "angry"
# alpha 172 1 0.5
# face 139 "surprise"
# alpha 139 1 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
@
かつての"仲間"に
追われるアルマス

# alpha 172 0 0.5
# alpha 139 0 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textsize 28
@
「虹のふもとには何がある？」

# alpha 3401911 1 0.5
# alpha 3503211 1 0.5
# alpha 3303111 1 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textsize 28
@
叛逆の調べとともに蘇る
忘れていた大切な思い出─

# alpha 3401911 0 0
# alpha 3503211 0 0
# alpha 3303111 0 0
# bgm "stop"
# se "SE_4772"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
@
第13章
[0040FF]『トレジャーメモリー』[-]
開幕

;;暗転(大)
# se "SE_0619"
# fadeout "black" 1
# waitandnext 0.8
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
@
第13章
[0040FF]『トレジャーメモリー』[-]
開幕

# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.2

# background "ancient_back"
# bgm "bgm036" 0
# fadein "black" 1
# waitandnext 1

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
[FF0000]覚醒ユニット追加！[-]

# se "SE_2520"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 200851 1 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
ペ　ル　ー　ン

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 200851 0 0
# alpha 200854 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 200854 2 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 2008 "perun_kyara_0020"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 200854 1 0
# move 200854 3 0
# scale 200854 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 2008 "perun_kyara_0014"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@ペルーン
雷パワー、レベルアップだね♪

# se "SE_4779"
# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 1
# waitandnext 1

# se "SE_2520"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 200854 0 0
# alpha 101221 1 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 36
@
ア　ダ　マ　ス

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 101221 0 0
# alpha 101225 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 101225 4 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 1012 "adamasu_unit_0009"
# waitandnext 3.5

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 101225 1 0
# move 101225 3 0
# scale 101225 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 1012 "adamasu_unit_0008"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@アダマス
神の刃の恐ろしさ、
教えてあげる♪

# se "SE_0619"
# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 1
# waitandnext 1

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 101225 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！
さらに…

# se "SE_2520"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 500535 1 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 36
@
ヴァジュラ
神器登場！

# voice 5005 "vajura_0004"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
神器探求
「聖骨砲・ヴァジュラ編」開催！

# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 500535 0 0
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
詳しくはお知らせをチェック！

;;暗転(大)
# bgm "stop"
# fadeout "black" 2
# se "SE_0050"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# waitandnext 2
@
詳しくはお知らせをチェック！
